channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-3781] Index related events should be delivered to metastore event listener
item.description: An event listener must be called for any DDL activity. For example, create_index, drop_index today does not call metaevent listener.
item.summary: Index related events should be delivered to metastore event listener

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
navis requested code review of "HIVE-3781 [jira] not all meta events call metastore event listener".
Reviewers: JIRA

DPAL-1950 Not all meta events call metastore event listener

An event listener must be called for any DDL activity. For example, create_index, drop_index today does not call metaevent listener.

TEST PLAN
EMPTY

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D7731

arc is messing with patch, so manually generated.
thejas Could you review this if test passes? It contains bug fix on table location of index data table, which was missed in HIVE-4064.

Doc note: This adds index to the description of configuration parameter hive.exec.drop.ignorenonexistent so the wiki needs to be updated (with version information):

  • Configuration Properties – hive.exec.drop.ignorenonexistent

Doc done: The wiki has been updated so I removed the TODOC15 label.

Version information was not needed, because hive.exec.drop.ignorenonexistent has covered DROP INDEX since 0.7.0 when the parameter was created (HIVE-1858).
